description.value:
Frequency once per day

You summon an aura of flurrying snow.

For 1 minute, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealment} against creatures more than 5 feet away, and any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you suffers [[/r {1d12}[cold]]]{1d12 cold damage} damage (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).

At [[/r {2d12}[cold]]]{13th} and [[/r {3d12}[cold]]]{17th} level, this damage increases by 1d12.
